title: Catfish UK The TV Show
overview: Julie Adenuga and Oobah ButlerÂ have been announced as the co-hosts of Catfish: The TV Show for MTV UK.Catfish UK is the first international iteration of the hit TV show, which follows the real-life stories of individuals in online relationships with partners they've never met in person.The series will launch with four one-hour episodes on MTV UK and around the world beginning in spring 2021, with six more episodes following later in the year
